t-test 

What does pairing do? 

1. Reduces (or eliminates!) bias
2. Reduces variance

```{r}


```

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")

data("sleep")
ggplot(sleep, aes(x = group, y = extra, group = ID)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()

```

```{r}
ggplot(sleep, aes(x = group, y = extra, group = ID)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
t.test(extra ~ group, data = sleep)

```
